items.text:
You hear Hy’s shrill whistling long before you see him. It’s said that
every Ranger in the Valley has tried to teach Hy Pimpot a new song to
whistle, but none of them have succeeded.

Eventually you spot the stout little gnome of a man intently chopping
and mixing vinegary-smelling herbs and vegetables into a large bowl.
“Good, good, you’re here,” he says without looking at you. “Try this
stew. I need to know if I’ve hit the right balance between ‘pleasant
heat’ and ‘tongue searing.’ What does it need? Kelpweed? Mourning
Root?”

You can help Hy Pimpot by gathering ingredients for the stew,
or you can clear him with
to ask him how to make the stew as good as possible.
